articles.title: Blackouts hit Earth as 8 M-class solar flares erupt in 24 hours, says NASA; Solar storm threat rises - HT Tech
articles.description: In the last 24 hours, as many as 8 M-class solar flares have erupted on a new sunspot sparking a rolling series of radio blackouts all across the Earth, NASA satellite detected. Is this a sign of a big incoming solar storm?
articles.content: In the early hours of July 12, a single M-class solar flare was produced by an emerging sunspot on the northeastern limb of the Sun, and it sparked blackouts over the North American continent, as per… [+2661 chars]
